channel.title: Buy/sell price of say general store changeable?
channel.description:
I want too make a new shop on a server (i can do this easily) where abouts can i change the buy and sell prices? and maybe change the shops that will buy this item? Also the shops may buy EVERY ITEM back with a certain discount, say 40 percent, how can i change this for just the one item too not do this?
Thanks in advance.
